defmodule Solution do
  @spec largest_perimeter(nums :: [integer]) :: integer
  def largest_perimeter(nums) do
    nums
    |> Enum.sort(:desc)
    |> Enum.reduce_while({0, []}, fn x, {acc, [a, b | rest]} ->
      if a + b > x, do: {:halt, a + b + x}, else: {:cont, {0, [x, a, b | rest]}}
    end)
    |> case do
      {_, _} -> -1
      perimeter -> perimeter
    end
  end
end
